title: Beach Ball
summaries: The Beach Ball is a novelty item. Using it creates an interactive beach ball for players to bounce around. After 2 seconds of sitting still [img:Mobile version] or coming to a full stop and then being tapped, it reverts to its item form which can be picked up and reused.

• On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Beach Ball can be purchased from the Party Girl for 20, and cannot be found in Water Chests.
  • On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version it cannot be purchased, and can instead be found in Water Chests.
If the Beach Ball is hit more than 10 times without it touching the ground, a status message appears saying "Beach Ball was hit <number of times> times before touching the ground!"
